news.title: Regional newspapers can thrive again if they go back to their community role
news.summary: Local newspapers are contradictory things. They are dismissed as “rags” and yet their familiar names are are part of the glue which holds communities together.

news.title: Regional newspapers can thrive again if they go back to their community role
